experience.description: I have been giving English and (mostly) Math lessons to high school students. It helped me pay for my studies and I learned patience and how to teach others.

Managed the accounting and documented each bank account movement in our management system. Whenever possible I used my Computer Science knowledge to improve the workflow in the office by making Python scripts or Excel worksheets to facilitate the job. Currently developing a script using Python and the Selenium library to grab important files from a web service.
I have been working on a software solution that interfaces with a Synology NAS and allows for easy creation of users and uploading of files, complete with a simple desktop UI.
